name: C&HRemote
0:
”Alexa, Turn on air conditioner”
”Alexa, Turn off air conditioner”
”Alexa, set air conditioner to 26 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
By using this skill, users can control Cooper&Hunter WiFi-enabled air conditioners. The unit can be turned on and off, operation mode can be changed, temperature can be set, and additional functions can be activated by voice command. 

Users can call this skill by saying, “Alexa, turn on air conditioner.” 

For “Account Linking” users must follow the steps below:

1. Click the ENABLE button, then enter the registered C&H Remote App account.
2. If you do not have a C&H Remote App account, please click the "click here" button on
the page and download the C&H Remote App.
3. After installation and registration, complete the air conditioner activation configuration.
4. When the air conditioner activation has been configured, users may return to the Account Linking interface of the Alexa App and enter the registered C&H Remote account to complete “Account Linking”.
